info.title: Mars Vista API
info.description: Unified API for NASA Mars rover photos with advanced filtering, location queries, and scientific metadata. Access 680,000+ photos from Curiosity, Perseverance, Opportunity, and Spirit rovers.

get.summary: Get all unique locations visited by rovers

parameters.name: min_photos
parameters.description: Minimum number of photos at location

get.summary: Get a specific location by ID

parameters.name: rovers
parameters.description: Comma-separated list of rover names (curiosity, perseverance, etc.)

parameters.name: min_photos
parameters.description: Minimum number of photos in panorama

get.summary: Get a specific panorama by ID
Get photos from the same location at different times
Get all cameras across all rovers
Get a specific camera by ID (name)

parameters.name: nasa_id
parameters.description:
Search by NASA ID (partial match, case-insensitive)
Example: nasa_id=NLB_780234

parameters.name: rovers
parameters.description:
Filter by one or more rovers (comma-separated)
Example: rovers=curiosity,perseverance

parameters.name: cameras
parameters.description:
Filter by one or more cameras (comma-separated)
Example: cameras=FHAZ,NAVCAM,MAST

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description:
Sort fields (comma-separated, prefix with - for descending)
Example: sort=-earth_date,camera

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description:
Fields to include (comma-separated, for sparse fieldsets)
Example: fields=id,img_src,sol,earth_date

parameters.name: include
parameters.description:
Related resources to include (comma-separated)
Example: include=rover,camera

parameters.name: mars_time_min
parameters.description:
Minimum Mars local time (format: Mhh:mm:ss or hh:mm:ss)
Example: M06:00:00 for 6 AM Mars time

parameters.name: mars_time_max
parameters.description:
Maximum Mars local time (format: Mhh:mm:ss or hh:mm:ss)
Example: M18:00:00 for 6 PM Mars time

parameters.name: mars_time_golden_hour
parameters.description: Filter for golden hour photos (sunrise/sunset lighting)

parameters.name: sample_type
parameters.description:
Filter by sample type (e.g., "Full", "Thumbnail", "Subframe")
Comma-separated for multiple types

parameters.name: mast_elevation_min
parameters.description:
Minimum mast elevation angle in degrees
Negative = looking down, Positive = looking up

parameters.name: mast_elevation_max
parameters.description: Maximum mast elevation angle in degrees

parameters.name: mast_azimuth_min
parameters.description: Minimum mast azimuth angle in degrees (0-360)

parameters.name: mast_azimuth_max
parameters.description: Maximum mast azimuth angle in degrees (0-360)

parameters.name: field_set
parameters.description:
Field set preset (minimal, standard, extended, scientific, complete)
Can also be comma-separated field names for custom selection

parameters.name: image_sizes
parameters.description:
Specific image sizes to include (comma-separated: small, medium, large, full)
Default: all sizes

parameters.name: FieldList
parameters.description: Parsed field names for sparse fieldsets

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: Effective page size (with default, capped at 100)

parameters.name: MarsTimeMinParsed
parameters.description: Parsed Mars time minimum (TimeSpan from midnight)

parameters.name: MarsTimeMaxParsed
parameters.description: Parsed Mars time maximum (TimeSpan from midnight)

post.description:
Efficiently retrieve multiple photos in a single request.
Maximum 100 IDs per request.

get.summary: Get a specific rover by slug
Get rover manifest (photo history by sol)
Get cameras for a specific rover
Get journey tracking data for a rover

type.description: A URI reference that identifies the problem type

title.description: A short, human-readable summary of the problem type

detail.description: A human-readable explanation specific to this occurrence of the problem

instance.description: A URI reference that identifies the specific occurrence of the problem

ApiError.description:
RFC 7807 Problem Details for HTTP APIs
Provides machine-readable error responses with detailed field-level validation errors

ids.description: List of photo IDs to retrieve (maximum 100)

BatchPhotoRequest.description: Request model for batch photo retrieval

photoCount.description: Number of photos from this camera (when included in statistics)

CameraResource.description: Camera resource in v2 API format

CameraResourceApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

fullName.description: Full camera name (e.g., "Front Hazard Avoidance Camera")

photoCount.description: Total number of photos from this camera

firstPhotoSol.description: First sol with photos from this camera

lastPhotoSol.description: Last sol with photos from this camera

data.description: The primary data for this response

CameraResourceListApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

FieldSetType.description: Field set types for controlling response data

JourneyResource.description: Journey resource representing a rover's path over a sol range

JourneyResourceApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

photosTaken.description: Number of photos taken at this waypoint

JourneyWaypoint.description: A waypoint on the rover's journey

firstVisited.description: First date this location was visited

lastVisited.description: Last date this location was visited

firstSol.description: First sol this location was visited

lastSol.description: Last sol this location was visited

photoCount.description: Total number of photos taken at this location

visitCount.description: Number of unique visits to this location

photos.description: Link to all photos at this location

360View.description:
Link to 360-degree view (future feature)
Note: Property name starts with number, needs explicit attribute

timeLapse.description: Link to time-lapse of this location (future feature)

LocationResource.description: Location resource representing a unique site/drive location visited by a rover

data.description: The primary data for this response

LocationResourceListApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

PaginationInfo.description: Pagination information supporting both page-based and cursor-based pagination

marsTimeStart.description: Mars time when panorama sequence started

marsTimeEnd.description: Mars time when panorama sequence ended

totalPhotos.description: Total number of photos in the panorama

stitchedPreview.description: Link to panorama preview/stitched image (future feature)

downloadSet.description: Link to download all photos as a set

photos.description: Photos that make up this panorama

PanoramaResource.description: Panorama resource representing an auto-detected panoramic sequence

data.description: The primary data for this response

PanoramaResourceListApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

nasaId.description: NASA's unique identifier for this photo

sol.description: Mars sol (day) when photo was taken

earthDate.description: Earth date when photo was taken (YYYY-MM-DD)

dateTakenUtc.description: UTC timestamp when photo was taken

dateTakenMars.description: Mars local time when photo was taken (e.g., "Sol-1000M14:23:45")

createdAt.description: When this photo was added to our database

imgSrc.description: URL to the photo image (legacy field, use images.medium instead)

rawData.description:
Raw NASA API response data (JSONB). Only included when field_set=complete.
Contains all original NASA fields for data validation and debugging.

large.description: Large size (1200px wide) - for detailed viewing

full.description: Full resolution - for download and analysis

PhotoImages.description: Multiple image URLs for different sizes

isPanoramaPart.description: Whether this photo is part of a panorama sequence

panoramaSequenceId.description: Panorama sequence identifier if part of a panorama

hasStereoPair.description: Whether this photo has a stereo pair

stereoPairId.description: Stereo pair photo ID if available

locationVisits.description: Number of times rover visited this location

PhotoResource.description: Photo resource in v2 API format with clear separation of attributes and relationships

PhotoResourceApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

data.description: The primary data for this response

PhotoResourceListApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

totalPhotos.description: Total count of photos in the period

groups.description: Statistics grouped by the requested dimension (camera, rover, or sol)

PhotoStatisticsResponse.description: Response containing photo statistics and analytics

PhotoStatisticsResponseApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

mastAzimuth.description: Mast azimuth angle (horizontal rotation in degrees)

mastElevation.description: Mast elevation angle (vertical tilt in degrees)

spacecraftClock.description: Spacecraft clock at time of capture

totalPhotos.description: Total photos taken on this sol

cameras.description: Cameras that took photos on this sol

PhotosBySol.description: Photos taken on a specific sol

id.description: Resource identifier (slug for rovers, id for others)

attributes.description: Attributes of the related resource (when included)

totalCount.description: Total count of resources matching the query (before pagination)

returnedCount.description: Number of resources returned in this response

query.description: The query parameters that were applied

maxSol.description: Maximum sol reached by this rover

totalPhotos.description: Total number of photos in our database

RoverManifestApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

id.description: Rover identifier (slug: curiosity, perseverance, opportunity, spirit)

RoverResource.description: Rover resource in v2 API format

RoverResourceApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

data.description: The primary data for this response

RoverResourceListApiResponse.description:
Standardized API response envelope for v2 endpoints
Inspired by JSON:API specification for consistency

key.description: The grouping key (camera name, rover name, or sol number as string)

count.description: Number of photos in this group

avgPerSol.description: Average photos per sol (only for rover grouping)

earthDate.description: Earth date for this sol (only for sol grouping)

StatisticsGroup.description: A single group in the statistics response

TimeMachineLocation.description: Location information for time machine query

earthDate.description: Earth date when photo was taken

marsTime.description: Mars time when photo was taken

TimeMachineResource.description: Time machine resource representing photos from the same location at different times

data.description: Photos from different times at this location

field.description: The field/parameter name that failed validation

value.description: The invalid value that was provided

example.description: An example of a valid value

ApiKey.description: API key authentication. Get your key from the dashboard after signing in.
ApiKey.name: X-API-Key
